help:
Welcome to **Architect**! üèóÔ∏è

Architect is a powerful Discord app integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to provide AI-driven automation and administration for your Discord server.

You can chat with Architect by mentioning it with `@Architect` or by replying to one of its previous messages.

**Security:** Architect will only reply to members with **Administrator** privileges to ensure your server's security.

**Note:** The chatbot is only available in server channels and does not respond to direct messages (DMs).

Use natural language commands to manage categories, channels, roles, permissions, send messages, and much more‚Äîall through conversational AI!

**Support & Resources:**
- Join our [Support Discord Server](https://discord.gg/Mgnaezufwc)
- Visit our [GitHub Project Repository](https://github.com/rpurinton/architect)

Happy building! üöÄ
cleared: The internal chat history in this channel has been cleared.
permissions_error: This command requires **Administrator** permissions to execute.
error: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
